title: SNF live updates: Davante Adams makes Jets debut in Pittsburgh
description: The All-Pro receiver was reunited with Aaron Rodgers after a trade from the Raiders. For the Steelers, Russell Wilson makes his first start.
author: Yahoo Sports
excerpt: The All-Pro receiver was reunited with Aaron Rodgers after a trade from the Raiders.
text: Change is the name of the game for the New York Jets and Pittsburgh Steelers as the teams clash on "Sunday Night Football" in Week 7.The biggest NFL news this week is Davante Adams getting traded to the 2-4 Jets for a conditional draft pick that could be a seismic shift in the AFC East. The New York offense has been sputtering, ranking 23rd in the NFL in scoring at 18.8 points per game, even with Aaron Rodgers surrounded by some quality offensive weapons like Garrett Wilson, Breece Hall and Braelon Allen. Reuniting Rodgers and Adams could be a boon for the Jets, who are trying to climb back into the playoff picture.Meanwhile, in Pittsburgh, the quarterback position has been the talk of the town, with Russell Wilson off the injury report and getting first-team reps in practice this week. Wilson had won the starting job over Justin Fields coming out of the preseason, but a calf injury late in camp sidelined him for the first six weeks. Pittsburgh is 4-2, with one of the best defenses in the NFL, but the offense ranks 20th in scoring and 26th in passing yards per game with Fields at the helm.You can chat about all of it with other fans and Yahoo Sports NFL experts using our new Game Discussions feature in the Yahoo Sports app. You can download the app for Apple here and Google here, and make sure you already have the latest version. That way you can open the game page, tap "Join the Discussions," agree to the guidelines, and then join the fun.Time: 8:20 p.m. ETLocation: Acrisure Stadium | PittsburghTV channel: NBCStreaming: Peacock, FuboLive16 updatesSun, October 20, 2024 at 6:03 PM MSTEnd 1st Quarter: Jets 7, Steelers 3The Jets had an 82-yard touchdown drive and Breece Hall was the start of that march, capping the drive with a 13-yard touchdown run. Aaron Rodgers targeted Davante Adams three times in the first quarter and he made one catch for nine yards. Across the field Russell Wilson was 2-for-6 for 19 yards making his first start for Pittsburgh. A big Najee Harris run on the Steelers' first drive got them in position to get the opening field goal.Oct 20, 2024; Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania, USA; Pittsburgh Steelers quarterback Russell Wilson (3) warms up before the game against the New York Jets at Acrisure Stadium. The Steelers would hold and get a Larry Ogunjobi sack for a quick 3-and-out.Sun, October 20, 2024 at 5:29 PM MSTChris Boswell gets Steelers on the board firstNice touch with the classic graphics from the Steelers social media department.Sun, October 20, 2024 at 5:28 PM MSTNajee Harris with a big run on the opening driveSun, October 20, 2024 at 5:27 PM MSTSteelers get the ball first and Russell Wilson is getting the startWilson, remember, won the job coming out of camp, but a calf injury sidelined him for the start of the season. html:
Change is the name of the game for the New York Jets and Pittsburgh Steelers as the teams clash on "Sunday Night Football" in Week 7.

The biggest NFL news this week is Davante Adams getting traded to the 2-4 Jets for a conditional draft pick that could be a seismic shift in the AFC East. The New York offense has been sputtering, ranking 23rd in the NFL in scoring at 18.8 points per game, even with Aaron Rodgers surrounded by some quality offensive weapons like Garrett Wilson, Breece Hall and Braelon Allen. Reuniting Rodgers and Adams could be a boon for the Jets, who are trying to climb back into the playoff picture.

Meanwhile, in Pittsburgh, the quarterback position has been the talk of the town, with Russell Wilson off the injury report and getting first-team reps in practice this week. Wilson had won the starting job over Justin Fields coming out of the preseason, but a calf injury late in camp sidelined him for the first six weeks. Pittsburgh is 4-2, with one of the best defenses in the NFL, but the offense ranks 20th in scoring and 26th in passing yards per game with Fields at the helm.

You can chat about all of it with other fans and Yahoo Sports NFL experts using our new Game Discussions feature in the Yahoo Sports app. You can download the app for Apple here and Google here, and make sure you already have the latest version. That way you can open the game page, tap "Join the Discussions," agree to the guidelines, and then join the fun.

  • Time: 8:20 p.m. ET

  • Location: Acrisure Stadium | Pittsburgh

  • TV channel: NBC

  • Streaming: Peacock, Fubo

Live16 updates

  • Sun, October 20, 2024 at 6:03 PM MST

    End 1st Quarter: Jets 7, Steelers 3

    The Jets had an 82-yard touchdown drive and Breece Hall was the start of that march, capping the drive with a 13-yard touchdown run. Aaron Rodgers targeted Davante Adams three times in the first quarter and he made one catch for nine yards.

    Across the field Russell Wilson was 2-for-6 for 19 yards making his first start for Pittsburgh. A big Najee Harris run on the Steelers' first drive got them in position to get the opening field goal.

  • Sun, October 20, 2024 at 5:59 PM MST

    Best on Best

    This round goes to Joey Porter...

  • Sun, October 20, 2024 at 5:50 PM MST

    Breece Hall finishes the drive with a 13-yard touchdown run

    It's the third rushing TD of the season for Breece Hall

  • Sun, October 20, 2024 at 5:48 PM MST

    Breece Hall with a couple of Chunk plays and the Jets are on the move

  • Sun, October 20, 2024 at 5:46 PM MST

    Rodgers and Adams make their first connection in a Jets uniform

  • Sun, October 20, 2024 at 5:34 PM MST

    Jets take the field and Aaron Rodgers' first pass is incomplete

    The pass was to Davante Adams, and while it was catchable, it was a little off target, and Adams couldn't bring it in on the first offensive snap. The Steelers would hold and get a Larry Ogunjobi sack for a quick 3-and-out.

  • Sun, October 20, 2024 at 5:29 PM MST

    Chris Boswell gets Steelers on the board first

    Nice touch with the classic graphics from the Steelers social media department.

  • Sun, October 20, 2024 at 5:28 PM MST

    Najee Harris with a big run on the opening drive

  • Sun, October 20, 2024 at 5:27 PM MST

    Steelers get the ball first and Russell Wilson is getting the start

    Wilson, remember, won the job coming out of camp, but a calf injury sidelined him for the start of the season. Justin Fields and the Pittsburgh offense have had a hard time getting out of first gear over the first month and a half of the season, and with Wilson healthy â€” even though the Steelers are 4-2 â€” Coach Mike Tomlin went to make the change to see what he's got in both Wilson and Fields.

  • Sun, October 20, 2024 at 5:21 PM MST

    Davante Adams in a Jets Uniform ðŸ‘€

    And his old buddy in the background...

  • Sun, October 20, 2024 at 5:06 PM MST

    Classic NFL Uniform enthusiasts will love this matchup

    This is a look at the Jets and Steelers in the Late 80s, and while there have some updates to the shape and cut of the uniforms and the paint on the helmets and facemasks, tonight's game is certainly a classic look, with the Jets reviving this uniform design this season and the Steelers in throwbacks, honoring their first Super Bowl champion team.

  • Sun, October 20, 2024 at 5:01 PM MST

    Jets inactives for Sunday Night Football

  • Sun, October 20, 2024 at 4:57 PM MST

    The Steelers are in their throwback uniforms tonight

    There have only been subtle changes over the past five decades to the Steelers uniforms, most notably the switch from block numerals to an italicized number font. Also, Pittsburgh will be rocking gray facemasks for tonight's game.

  • Sun, October 20, 2024 at 4:54 PM MST

    The Steelers are honoring the 50th anniversary of their first Super Bowl winning team

    Legends are in the house at Acrisure Stadium for the celebration tonight.

  • Sun, October 20, 2024 at 4:52 PM MST

    Steelers inactives for Sunday Night Football

  • Sun, October 20, 2024 at 4:51 PM MST

    Russell Wilson gets the start tonight for the Steelers, and here's what Mike Tomlin said about making the change
